name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's major "positive energy" bloggers talk about the situation in Syria and its follow-up:
 The heart of a single husband: It is impossible for Damascus to fall. It is impossible to say it is impossible.
 Shen Yi, a professor at Fudan University: The rebels just checked in and took pictures in Aleppo and did not dare to go south.
 Jin Canrong: As long as the Syrian government forces don’t panic, there should be no problem.
 Gu Yan Mu Chan: Syria will not collapse.
 The seventh brother of station B said in the live broadcast: If Syria can be lost, quit the live broadcast industry!
 Blogger "Brother Xiao Talks Overseas": As long as Damascus does not lose, Assad will surely win!
 Follow-up:
 Jin Canrong deleted the video; Shen Yi deleted the video; the live broadcast clip of Brother Qi from Station B talking about the situation in Syria was set to be visible only to him; "Brother Xiao talked about overseas" slapped himself wildly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As Bashar al-Assad fled to Russia, Syrian citizens, filled with resentment, paraded him through the streets using a donkey instead.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Daily Mail reported: Bashar al-Assad and his family came to Moscow with a fortune of $2 billion, where they spent $40 million to buy 19 apartments in Moscow City, including a luxury apartment in the eighth tallest building in Russia. They bought these properties between 2013 and 2019.
